page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: Farms in the area concentrate on pastoral farming for sound commercial gain .Apart from Patterton Farm which is a busy working farm the other three former farms now rent out land for livestock . 90% of the farm land is enclosed rough grazing with the field size generally small and with shelter afforded by rows of mixed deciduous trees .The upkeep of fencing in the wake of vandalism and natural damage is a major task . Farms concentrate in the main on dairy farming with Patterton Farm the main focus for milk production .Small quantities of barley and hay are grown mainly for winter feed .Sheep are also grazed where suitable fencing has been installed .Paisley Market is the focal point for buying and selling in the area .
